title: "Dish TV brings voice search to its app"
excerpt: "MUMBAI: The innovations continue in the pay TV segment. This time it is at DTH provider Dish TV India. One of the pioneers in this ecosystem, has introduced a voice enabled search feature in its MyDishTV mobile app in addition to its already existing search features."
